xmlconfig.CreditNoteDocument: Configure the system wide file name pattern for all pdf credit note documents generated by the system. The system will substitute in the configured CreditNotePrefix if you include {CreditNotePrefix} in the value. The system will substitute in the credit note identifier for each individual credit note document if you include {CreditNoteID} in the PdfFileNamePattern.</--> {CreditNotePrefix}{CreditNoteID}
